signingRoom.title: Signing Room
signingRoom.invalidTokenDescription: This signing link is invalid or has expired. Please contact the document sender for a new link.
signingRoom.completedDescription: Thank you! You have successfully signed the document. The document owner has been notified.
signingRoom.declinedDescription: You have declined to sign this document. The document owner has been notified.
signingRoom.instructions: Please review the document and fill in all required fields below. Click 'Complete Signing' when you're done, or 'Decline' if you do not wish to sign.

signingView.title: Title
signingView.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields before completing.

declineDialog.title: Decline to Sign
declineDialog.warning: Are you sure you want to decline?
declineDialog.warningDescription: This action cannot be undone. The document owner will be notified of your decision.
declineDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Please provide a reason for declining to sign this document...
declineDialog.reasonMinLength: Reason must be at least 10 characters
declineDialog.reasonMaxLength: Reason must be less than 500 characters
declineDialog.note: Note: Your reason will be shared with the document owner.

completeDialog.title: Complete Signing
completeDialog.warningDescription: Please review all fields before submitting. This action cannot be undone.
completeDialog.finalNote: By clicking 'Confirm', you agree that your signature is legally binding.

useSigning.fillAllFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields
useSigning.completeError: Failed to complete signing. Please try again.
useSigning.alreadyCompleted: This document has already been signed or declined.
useSigning.declineError: Failed to decline signing. Please try again.

inviteForm.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
inviteForm.nameMaxLength: Name must be less than 100 characters

orderSelector.sequentialDescription: Signers must sign in order. Each signer will receive the link only after the previous signer completes.
orderSelector.parallelDescription: All signers can sign at the same time. Everyone receives the link immediately.

fieldAssignment.noFields: No fields have been added to this document. Please add fields in the document editor first.
fieldAssignment.warningDescription: Please assign all fields to signers before sending invitations.

invitePage.documentNotFoundDescription: The document you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.
invitePage.noFieldsDescription: This document doesn't have any fields yet. Please add fields before inviting signers.
invitePage.title: Invite Signers
invitePage.step1Alert: Add signers who will sign this document. You can add multiple signers and choose the signing order.
invitePage.step2Alert: Assign each field to a signer. All fields must be assigned before sending invitations.
invitePage.step2AlertDescription: Each signer will only see and fill the fields assigned to them.

useInvite.unassignedFields: {{count}} field(s) are not assigned. Please assign all fields.
useInvite.duplicateEmails: Duplicate emails are not allowed. Each signer must have a unique email.
useInvite.validationError: Validation error. Please check your input.
useInvite.error: Failed to send invitations. Please try again.
